TermDefinition.DefinitionText: A term used in mammography that refers to the replacement of breast tissue with fatty tissue. This commonly occurs as a woman ages.

MediaLink.alt: Pronunciation of dictionary term "fatty-replaced breast tissue"
Pronunciation of dictionary term "reemplazo de tejido mamario con tejido graso"

GlossaryTerm.SpanishTermName: reemplazo de tejido mamario con tejido graso

SpanishTermDefinition.DefinitionText: Término usado en mamografía que se refiere al reemplazo del tejido de mama con tejido graso. Por lo general, esto se presenta cuando la mujer envejece.
